text: vA a#hOrAqtrANi# paqSUnEqva prajA#tAn pratiqShThAM ga#mayaq-tyOSha#dhIByO vEqhataqmA la#BEta praqjAkA#maq OSha#dhayOq vA EqtaM praqjAyaiq pari#bAdhantEq yO&la#M praqjAyaiq san praqjAM na viqndataq OSha#dhayaqH Kaluq vA Eqtasyaiq sUtuqmapi# Gnantiq yA vEqhad-BavaqtyOSha#dhIrEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tA EqvAsmaiq svAdyOnE$H praqjAM pra ja#nayanti viqndatE$ - [  ]  31
